text: The Blade Breakers are a [[minotaur]] clan of [[Droaam]]. They worship "One Horn", an interpretation of the [[Horned King|Tol Kharash]] who rewards displays of strength and courage. While the Blade Breakers are just as aggressive as the [[Blood Horns]], they are less brutal. It is possible that while they believe One Horn is an aspect of the Horned King, they are in truth drawing on a different power entirelyâ€”perhaps the essence of [[Dol Dorn]].
title: Blade Breakers
